Package org.xmappr.converters

Interface Summary
CollectionConverting  
Converter Core converter interface implemented by ValueConverter and ElementConverters
ElementConverter Classes implementing ElementConverter interface are used for serializing/deserializing xml nodes to Java objects.
 

Class Summary
Base64 Utility class implementing Base64 decoder/encoder.

CharConverter  
ClassConverter This is a default ElementConverter that tries to convert any Class based on injected mappers.

DoubleConverter  
EmptyStringConverter ValueConverter for converting to/from Strings, similar to StringConverter.

StringConverter  
ValueConverter todo fill this
ValueConverterWrapper Wraps ValueConverter so that it behaves like ElementConverter.
